text: Cloak & Dagger is a 1984 American spy family adventure movie directed by Richard Franklin and is the third version of the short story The Boy Cried Murder by Cornell Woolrich. It was first filmed as The Window in 1949. It stars Henry Thomas, Dabney Coleman, Michael Murphy, Jeanette Nolan, Christina Nigra, John McIntire, Eloy Casados and Tim Rossovich and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 adventure movies Category:1980s family movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American family movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Richard Franklin Category:American mystery movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:1980s mystery movies Category:Movies about computing Category:Movies about children Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:1980s crime thriller movies Category:American children's adventure movies
